title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 420.4 - Withdrawal from State Adoption Service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 420.4 - Withdrawal from State Adoption Service

State Regulations
A child's name will be withdrawn from the State Adoption

Service when the authorized agency enters the appropriate code into the CCRS
that indicates: (a) the child has been
adopted; (b) the child has reached
his or her 18th birthday, and will not consent to the agency's adoption
plan; (c) the child has been
discharged from foster care in New York State; or
(d) the child has died. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
420.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
